snippet.title: Shivering Hearts - Steam Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Shivering Hearts is a light-hearted role-playing game illustrated through detailed, hand-drawn watercolour paintings. Explore a world that reacts to your choices. The player can achieve over 120 possible ending combinations.

Coming to Steam 21st July 2020. Give it a wishlist!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1351820/Shivering_Hearts/

Learn more at: https://shiveringhearts.com

#shiveringhearts #gamedev #indiegame

Check out 4k resolution wallpaper for Shivering Hearts in the link:
https://imgur.com/a/EzxFUi9
